ovdesc.p: This application holds the user exits routines that start and stop the listeners. Routine(s) are called before the SPF is updated as B in the main server and routine(s) after the SPF is updated as B.

desc.p: Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
